headline: MarketAxess to Participate in the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference
summary: NEW YORK, September 02, 2025--MarketAxess Holdings Inc. (Nasdaq: MKTX), the operator of a leading electronic trading platform for fixed-income securities, today announced that Chris Concannon, Chief Executive Officer, and Ilene Fiszel Bieler, Chief Financial Officer, will participate in the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference on September 9, 2025.

headline: 2 Cash-Heavy Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 Facing Headwinds
summary: Companies with more cash than debt can be financially resilient, but that doesn’t mean they’re all strong investments. Some lack leverage because they struggle to grow or generate consistent profits, making them unattractive borrowers.
